body_html:
What's your plan on the tensor dim limit?

Pyro makes tensors with dimension O(#statements) in a probabilistic program, so if a probabilistic program for a time series has 1000 sample statements then Pyro will create a tensor of 1000 dimensions. It works great in PyTorch 0.4. If you plan to drop support for unbounded dim tensors, then @eb8680 and I will prioritize finding a workaround in Pyro.

body:
What's your plan on the tensor dim limit?

Pyro makes tensors with dimension `O(#statements)` in a probabilistic program, so if a probabilistic program for a time series has 1000 sample statements then Pyro will create a tensor of 1000 dimensions. It works great in PyTorch 0.4. If you plan to drop support for unbounded dim tensors, then @eb8680 and I will prioritize finding a workaround in Pyro.
